item.title: SqlServer, EFCore, JSON ðŸ‘€
item.description: Sometimes we have been forced to work with JSON stored on table columns, it will have happened to you too!. In this post I want to show you how work with that using EntityFramework Core dotnet / efcore Clearly this is one of many possible ways. We could talk for a long time about the choice to store JSON into RDBMS is a good or bad choice, but the intent of this post isn’t make a rant.
